name: Groovy Chick: My Fashion World
overview: Become an expert beautician: measured by Attractiveness, Originality, Practicality & Chic Style finish Satisfy your customer to unlock 12 fashion styles: classic, glamour, sporty, elegant etc... Increase your boutique reputation! • Work with 120 articles of varied clothing Sculpt hair, design new look make over's Quick Play Mode represents one day in any area of the boutique Storyline Mode represents the whole adventure in the New York fashion scene!
